name: Helm of the Gods
originalText:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control.

rulings.text: If you cast an Aura spell targeting a permanent controlled by an opponent, you still control that Aura. It will count toward the bonus given by Helm of the Gods.
